48 enum class ProcessQueueFlag {
49  kLate = 1 << 0 // Queue is performing a late update
50 };
51 MAKE_FLAGS(ProcessQueueFlag, ProcessQueueFlags);

54 class ProcessQueue {
55 public:
56  typedef std::vector<StrongProcessPtr> ProcessVec;
57 
58  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
61  ProcessQueue();
62  virtual ~ProcessQueue();
64 
65  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
68 
70  const SortingLayers& sortingLayers() const { return m_sortingLayers; }
71  SortingLayers& sortingLayers() { return m_sortingLayers; }
72 
74  size_t getProcessCount() const { return m_processes.size(); }
75 
77  bool isLate() const {
78  ProcessQueueFlags flags = (ProcessQueueFlags)m_queueFlags.load();
79  return flags.testFlag(ProcessQueueFlag::kLate);
80  }
81  void setLate(bool late) {
82  ProcessQueueFlags flags = (ProcessQueueFlags)m_queueFlags.load();
83  flags.setFlag(ProcessQueueFlag::kLate, late);
84  m_queueFlags.store((uint32_t)flags);
85  }
